articles.title: What is the difference between Pandemic and Epidemic - Times of India
articles.description: Pandemic and epidemic are two terms most people use interchangeably to refer to stages of the spreading of any infectious disease.
articles.content:
Although there is a blurred line between epidemic and pandemic, here are a few things that you should know about pandemic:
-It affects a large geographical area, mostly the entire world
-It is generally caused by a new strain of a virus
